subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Last day of the 1971 season. Top of the ninth, the Yankees down, 7-5, to the Senators. Final game ever for the Senators in Washington, before they skedaddled to Arlington, Tex.
snippet: Last day of the 1971 season. Top of the ninth, the Yankees down, 7-5, to the Senators. Final game ever for the Senators in Washington, before they skedaddled to Arlington, Tex.
